poem:
Title: "Puppets Quiver in Power's Play"

In webs of fibres woven thin,
Caulfield dances, caught within.
Ideas rising, rumours fall,
Echoing the 15-minute call.
Skeins of power hold her tight,
Against the looming Commons' night.
Silent Mordaunt looks away -
An honest voice, dismissed to fray.
In the deafening halls of sway,
Truth and deceit interplay.
